title: The Best and Worst Workplace Technologies
sub_head: We asked readers which tools best help them get their jobs doneâ€”and which are the biggest time wasters
body:
Our work lives are often dominated by technology, though the devices and systems designed to help us do our jobs are sometimes our undoing.
Constant innovations and learning curves can take a toll on productivity, as can glitchy technology or clunky user interfaces. On the other hand, technology allows us new ways to create, connect and measure our success.
